resources.string: Time is up. Good work, time to take a break!
Before starting, let\'s take a quick look at the way this app works.
1. To start the timer, simply click on it.\n2. To pause the timer, click it again.\n3. To reset the timer, click and hold on it.
You can now start the timer and work. :)
The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method using a timer to break down work into 25-minute-long intervals, separated by short breaks.
